actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to make certain that recipients of aid or assistance under the various Federal-State public assistance and other aid programs will not have the amount of such aid or assistance reduced because of increases in monthly social security benefits.

summary.text: Provides that recipients of aid or assistance under the various Federal-State public assistance and other aid programs will not have the amount of such aid or assistance reduced because of increases in monthly social security benefits.

titles.title: A bill to make certain that recipients of aid or assistance under the various Federal-State public assistance and other aid programs will not have the amount of such aid or assistance reduced because of increases in monthly social security benefits.
